verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARG1: he will withdraw the United States from the Iran nuclear deal] .
President Donald Trump announced he [V: will] withdraw the United States from the Iran nuclear deal .
President Donald Trump announced [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: withdraw] [ARG1: the United States] [ARG2: from the Iran nuclear deal] .
